sentences.en: A craze for classification and nomenclature superceded the ingenious or fanciful systems.
sentences.cn: 对分类和命名法的狂热取代了虚幻的系统.

sentences.en: Along with the FD, Hyundai will launch a new alpha - numerical nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 随着金融衍生工具, 现代汽车将推出新的α - 数值名称.
巴克伦建立了很有价值的命名法.

sentences.en: Charles trotted out his little bit of scientific nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯炫耀他那点科学名词.

sentences.en: Eradication of the Alpine nomenclature is still proving a Herculean task.
sentences.cn: 根除阿尔卑斯命名法依然是一项极其艰难的工作.

sentences.en: It developed variations in nomenclature and in substance.
sentences.cn: 它在名称上和实质上都发生了一些变化.

sentences.en: It is perhaps useful at this point to discuss the current European nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 讨论欧洲流行的名称,在这一点上也许是可取的.

sentences.en: Latin since the Renaissance; used for scientific nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 文艺复兴以后的拉丁语; 用做科学术语.

sentences.en: Multiply unsaturated compounds are usually best named by the IUPAC nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 多重不饱和化合物一般最好用IUPAC命名法来命名.

sentences.en: Nomenclature and criteria for diagnosis of ischemic heart disease.
sentences.cn: 缺血性心脏病的命名及诊断标准.

sentences.en: Regard international as unified plant nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 作为国际统一的植物命名法.

sentences.en: Some annotations mainly concerning nomenclature and taxonomy are supplied.
sentences.cn: 本文给出了有关多孔菌命名和分类的相应注释.

sentences.en: Standard colour cards for the nomenclature of commercial dyestuffs ( Dyestuffs for textile )
sentences.cn: GB3899.2-1986染料产品命名标准色卡 ( 纺织品用染料 )

sentences.en: The official periodical of the International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature.
sentences.cn: 国际动物命名法委员会的正式刊物.

sentences.en: The principle of nomenclature for commercial dyestuffs ( Dyestuffs for textile )
sentences.cn: GB3899.1-1986染料产品命名原则 ( 纺织品用染料 )

trans.tran_cn: 系统命名法，命名（过程），（某一学科的）术语，专门名称
trans.tran_en: a system of naming things, especially in science
